data.title: RIDEmory
data.subtitle: Emory campus ride-sharing platform
data.content: A self-updating database of ride information for Emory students accessible via web and GroupMe.

data.title: Web Portfolio
data.subtitle: My personal portfolio website
data.content: A website showcasing projects, experiences, and my interests, built with React.js ensuring seamless navigation and responsive design.

data.title: Stack
data.subtitle: A journal for selfie-lovers
data.content: A social media platform that allows users to post photos and combine them with music, creating a unique and personalized timelapse.

data.title: Loop
data.subtitle: Musical social media
data.content: An accessible and socially engaging listening platform to freely post music, moods, and tweets on top of its streaming service.
